title: [Mac] Yosemite bug
body:
I just updated my mac from Maverick to Yosemite, I then went into custom games to test out, not a problem

But now when i go into normals/ranked, i cannot click on anything or ping properly, I am also getting punished for the leaver buster for trying to find a way to fix the problem, any help?

replies.body:
I know I might sound like I'm beating a dead horse, or trying to be funny but being completely unoriginal at the same time, but...

If you buy a mac and expect it to be a PC, you will be disappointed. Mac's are made for graphic design, music, and other various hipster activities, not gaming.
